In the event that a dispute arises as a result of the use of this software by an act of damaging the honor and trust of a third party, an intellectual property right or other infringement of rights, etc., the Company shall not be liable for any such dispute or claim and the customer shall indemnify the costs and damages caused to the Company due to such dispute or claim. We do not guarantee anything about this software, including the operation and functions of this software and the quality of output result of printed matter etc. obtained using this software. We do not assume any liability for any loss or damage sufferred by you including indirect damage, lost profit etc. as a result of your use of this software. Uploading is possible if you agree with the above.
designer.imgUploadDisclaimerStr2: The total upload size is limited to a maximum of 50MB. To ensure trouble-free upload, it is recommended to upload one image at a time.
